paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a novel BRCA2 pathogenic germline mutation and its clinical significance in a patient with recurrent urothelial carcinoma.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Here, we report a 60-year-old female patient diagnosed with left ureter high-grade UC.

functional_data.summary: The mutation leads to the formation of a stop codon, resulting in a truncated protein.

variants.additional_notes: This is the first report of this specific BRCA2 mutation.
key_quotes: This mutation led to the formation of a stop code, which stopped transcription at L557 and formed a truncated protein.
As far as we know, c.1670T>A has never been reported in the literature and the Clinvar database.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data was extracted from the main text.
